name: Baganda Music
description: Music of the Baganda people, a Bantu ethnic group indigenous to Uganda.

children.name: Buganda Royal Court Music
children.description: Highest traditional and refined musical forms of Buganda, reserved for the Kabaka (the king of Buganda).

children.name: Kadongo kamu
children.description: Oldest form of mainstream music in Uganda, dating back to the early 1950s, translating to “one little guitar” from the Luganda language.

children.name: Mataali
children.description: Islamic praise genre of the Muslim community of Buganda, named after the frame drum on which the rhythm is played.
